wikipedia_page.main: Annot Robinson, nicknamed Annie, (née Wilkie; 8 June 1874 – 29 September 1925) was a Scottish suffragette and pacifist. She was sentenced to six months for trying to break in to the House of Commons. She helped to found the Women’s International League for Peace and Freedom.

response: * Annot Robinson (1874–1925) – née Wilkie, nicknamed Annie, pacifist and suffragette
*Annot Robinson, née Wilkie, nicknamed Annie, (1874–1925), British pacifist and suffragette
